titleStmt.title: To the Worshipfull and my singular good friend mistres Anne Robertes.
titleStmt.author: T., I.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: To the Worshipfull and my singular good friend mistres Anne Robertes.
analytic.author: T., I.

monogr.title: An ould facioned love. Or a loue of the ould facion : By I.T. gent
monogr.author: Watson, Thomas

div.head: To the Worshipfull and my singular good friend mistres Anne Robertes.
div.p:
I Do not (good Mistres Roberts) present these papers vnto you as either worthy of your viewe and grauitie, or any way answerable to the least part of your great courtesies, but being many waies highlie bounden, I haue sought by such meanes (as vnable students are wonte) to performe to you as to my good Patronesse, some shewe of gratitude by my pen, which I am not able to expresse in
any other meete furniture of fortune. Accept therefore I praie you, not so much the value which is of no worth, as the mind of him who carieth you in all due & reuerent estimatiō. And so beseeching God to yeeld you all the effect of your vertuous desire, I humblie take my leaue.

closer.signed: Yours in all due affection and commaundement. I. T.
